Posts.EditableText: I wanted to change my email from a side email to my main email, but whenever I click the link provided in the confirmation email, the website it opens says "Email address confirmation failure" and prompts me to copy-paste the link. But even when I try this, and other ways of opening the link, it gives the same message. Does anyone know how to fix this? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: I wanted to change my email from a side email to my main email, but whenever I click the link provided in the confirmation email, the website it opens says "Email address confirmation failure" and prompts me to copy-paste the link. But even when I try this, and other ways of opening the link, it gives the same message. Does anyone know how to fix this? Thanks!
